metadata.title: Wednesday, 30th October, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the Government will construct a prison in Kapiri-Mposhi District; and
(b)    when more police officers will be sent to the District to curb the high rate of crime.

questions.minister: Vice President how long a former government vehicle should continue to bear a GRZ number plate after it has been sold to a former office holder.
Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    when construction of a sub-station to connect Sikongo District to the national electricity grid will commence; and
(b)    what the cause of the delay in the construction of the sub-station is.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    what progress the Government has made in implementing the Markets and Bus Stations Act No. 7 of 2007;
(b)    what has caused the delay in implementing the Act;
(c)    whether the Government has any plans of reviewing the Act; and
(d)    if so, when the Act will be reviewed.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    why the Government has never constructed a new secondary school in Mbala Parliamentary Constituency;
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to build a new secondary school in the Constituency;
(c)    if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(d)    what the estimated cost of the project is. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply - Motion (11th October) - Resumption of Debate.
